channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
OK, I have tryed to get a server up and running before, but had no luck, i am trying again, and I've set up my no-ip, i've port fowarded my router, I've changed the paths on my fire wall, I've edited the client and "run" and "compiler" files, so idk what the problem could be :confused: When i use the moparscape client, i type into the ip "127.0.0.1" I've also tryed "0.0.0.0" and it acts like its trying to log me in, because i can see the inventory thing, just nothing in it, and the minimap is black, and so is the srceen, and then about 5 seconds latter, i get taken back to the login screen, much help would be appreciated :cool:
HERE IS WHAT IT SAYS IN MY CMD PROMPT when i try to log in [img]http://imgtool.in/images/helpl0x.png[/img]

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Error T2 means the server tried to send the client an unsupported packet. Download the client that came with the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @mtiben mtiben
item.description:
@mtiben wrote:

Did that source come with a client moparscape’s client may not support it?

Read full topic
